attributes.action: Make it permissable to rent out your house regardless of mortgage size.
attributes.additional_details:
Need for by to let mortgages 
Typically require minimum 25% deposit rather than 10%
Unable to change purpose of mortgage until 25% paid off
Ability to rent out a house should be based on ability to keep up repayments whilst empty.
Face criminal charges if you rent out whilst on a residential mortgage
All these things make it more difficult for people to rent out homes and are putting more strain on the government's housing crisis whilst alleviating the restrictions would support housing needs.
attributes.background: If I want to rent out my house I have to have a certain type of mortgage and have a larger deposit to put down although I  can afford the house even whilst not tenanted this means the house stands empty whilst it could be providing an affordable family home to someone.

rejection.details:
